arts.ttl: Delighted Jordy Clasie extends AZ Alkmaar stay until 2028: “Promising times are coming”
arts.sum: Jordy Clasie (33) has signed a new contract at AZ Alkmaar, keeping him at the AFAS Stadion until the summer of 2028.

arts.ttl: Preview: FC Utrecht vs. AZ Alkmaar - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's Eredivisie clash between FC Utrecht and AZ Alkmaar, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
